title: Verify Custom TargetCursor appearance and behavior
description: Check the Custom TargetCursor renders correctly with interactive corner brackets and smooth animations replacing the default cursor across supported browsers and devices.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop and mobile browsers.
Verify the default cursor is replaced by the custom TargetCursor.
Check that interactive corner brackets appear on the cursor.
Move cursor across different UI elements and observe cursor animation.
Ensure cursor animations are smooth without lag or stutter.
Test TargetCursor responsiveness on different screen sizes.
TargetCursor behavior remains consistent and visually correct on all devices.

title: Validate Magic Bento Grid interactive card hover and particle animations
description: Ensure the Magic Bento Grid shows correct interactive card layout with magnetism effects, hover animations, and particle effects onAbout and Skills sections.

steps.description: Navigate to the About Section and observe the Bento Grid layout.
Verify cards display correctly with expected layout and content.
Hover over each card in the grid.
Check hover magnetism effect pulls the card towards the cursor smoothly.
Particle animations trigger on hover and animate correctly.
Repeat steps on the Skills Section cards.
Ensure consistency of hover effects and particle animations on skills cards.

title: Verify Scroll Reveal animations trigger correctly on scroll
description: Confirm UI elements animate as they scroll into view across all sections with no performance degradation.

steps.description: Load the home page and slowly scroll down through all sections.
Observe that designated elements trigger Scroll Reveal animations when entering viewport.
Ensure animations run smoothly without jank or delay.
Scroll back up and down rapidly.
Check animations behave consistently even on quick or repeated scrolling.
Test on mobile devices with various resolutions.
Verify Scroll Reveal animations perform well on mobile browsers.

title: Test Typing Animation and Decrypted Text dynamic presentation
description: Validate dynamic typing effect for role/title and decrypted text animation on Hero section appears and cycles correctly.

steps.description: Open the homepage and locate the role/title presentation area.
Typing animation starts automatically, typing the role/title text character by character.
Decrypted Text effect runs as expected, revealing text with decryption animation.
Allow the animations to cycle through multiple roles/titles if applicable.
Typing and Decrypted Text animations loop smoothly without freezing or glitching.

title: Verify Dock Navigation usability and macOS style hover effects
description: Ensure Dock Navigation renders correctly, shows macOS style icons and hover effects, and navigates to intended sections or external links.

steps.description: Locate the Dock Navigation component at the bottom of the page.
Verify all intended navigation icons (Home, Skills, Projects, Contact, GitHub, LinkedIn) appear correctly.
Hover mouse pointer over each icon.
Hover effects mimic macOS style magnification or highlight animations.
Click on each internal navigation icon.
Page smoothly scrolls or jumps to the corresponding section.
Click on external social icons for GitHub and LinkedIn.
New tabs open with correct social profile URLs.

title: Validate Dot Grid Background cursor interaction
description: Check that the dot grid background interacts subtly with cursor proximity and maintains smooth animations without performance impact.

steps.description: Observe the dot grid background on homepage and inner pages if available.
Move the cursor slowly and quickly across various regions of the background.
Dots subtly react to cursor proximity with smooth animations.
No flickering or animation glitches occur during interaction.
Test responsiveness and performance impact on desktop and mobile devices.
Background animations do not degrade site performance or user experience.

title: Test Contact Form validation and error handling
description: Ensure the contact form fields validate input correctly, block invalid submissions, and display user friendly error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact Section.
Attempt to submit the form with all fields empty.
Form prevents submission and shows validation error messages for required fields.
Enter invalid email address format and valid other inputs.
Form prevents submission and displays email format error message.
Fill all fields with valid data.
No validation errors are shown and submit button is enabled.

title: Verify Contact Form email submission via Resend API
description: Test that submitting the contact form sends an email through the Resend API and displays appropriate success or failure feedback to the user.

steps.description: Fill contact form with valid inputs.
Submit the form.
Wait for response from /api/contact endpoint.
Verify success message is displayed on successful email delivery.
Verify failure message is shown if API fails or network error occurs.

title: Verify responsive design and layout consistency
description: Ensure the site layout adapts correctly and remains visually consistent on different screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the website on devices or simulators with screen widths: 320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px.
Check that all sections and UI components scale and reposition properly without overflow or clipping.
Verify menus, grids, animations and text remain readable and accessible.
Rotate devices (if applicable) and check UI reflows accordingly.
No layout breakages occur on orientation change.

title: Test SEO meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and robots.txt configuration
description: Check for comprehensive SEO implementation via meta tags on pages, existence and correctness of structured data, and presence of sitemap.xml and robots.txt files.

steps.description: Open the homepage source code.
Verify meta tags for title, description, keywords, and viewport exist and contain appropriate content.
Check for structured data script tags (JSON-LD) present and correctly formed.
Access /sitemap.xml via browser or API call.
Confirm sitemap.xml exists and lists all relevant pages.
Access /robots.txt file.
Verify robots.txt exists and is properly configured to allow indexing of public pages.

title: Verify dark theme styling consistency and mode persistence
description: Confirm the dark theme styling is applied consistently across all pages and UI components, and that dark mode preference is stable across sessions.

steps.description: Load the website and verify dark theme is default or correctly toggled based on user preference.
Check colors, gradients, and UI components reflect dark theme design as per specs.
Toggle dark mode if toggle option provided.
Verify smooth transition and full theme switch.
Reload the page or close and reopen the browser.
Dark mode preference persists and theme loads accordingly.

title: Validate Project Showcase section project details and links
description: Ensure featured projects display correct details including title, description, technologies, and clickable links that open appropriate project URLs.

steps.description: Scroll to the Projects Section.
Verify each project card shows the project title, summary, and technology stack.
Click on project links or buttons.
Links open the respective project pages in a new tab or correct routing.
No broken or dead links exist.

title: Check Resume download functionality
description: Verify that the resume download link or button triggers file download and the file is accessible and correctly named.

steps.description: Locate the Resume download button or link on the site.
Click the download button/link.
Ensure the resume file is downloaded.
Open the downloaded file to confirm it is the correct resume document.

title: Verify smooth scrolling behavior on navigation
description: Ensure clicking navigation links (via Dock or other section links) causes smooth scrolling transitions to targeted sections without jumpy behavior.

steps.description: Click each internal navigation link in the Dock Navigation and other internal links.
Page scrolls smoothly to the corresponding section.
Rapidly switch between navigation links multiple times.
Smooth scroll remains responsive without lag or locking.
